antispoof-desc: Mɔŋmi soli zaŋ chaŋ accounts namda din gabi-gbana ni, din ka nini ka di nahingbana lahi nyɛ zaɣ' yinsi
antispoof-conflict-top: Yuli ŋɔ lana "$1" waɣi yaɣi di ŋmanila ŋɔnima {{PLURAL:$2|username|usernames}}:
antispoof-name-illegal:
Nangbankpeeni yi yɛn taɣi, yuli ŋɔ lana "$1" bi tu ni di be ni: $2.
Pahimi suɣulo ka taɣi so.
antispoof-badtype: Yu' shɛli din kpɛhi maa kpee kani.
antispoof-empty: Yuli din kpɛri kpe na kani.
antispoof-prohibited: Bansu yuya ku tooi mali $1 dama di nyɛla din chihira
antispoof-combining: Yu' shɛŋa din bachinima laɣim taba ku tooi deei "$1".
antispoof-unassigned: Yu' shɛŋa ku mali bachi "$1" dama lala bachi maa bi tooi baŋ.
antispoof-deprecated:
Yuya ku tooi mali bachi ŋɔ
"$1" dama di nyɛla bɛ ni bɛ saɣi n-ti shɛli
